requirements.summary: Force production public-domain URL generation to resolve to growithtutor.com via PUBLIC_DOMAIN/getPublicUrl/getPublicAssetUrl while avoiding edits to immutable paths.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is built for production with the projectâ€™s default configuration, `PUBLIC_DOMAIN` evaluates to `growithtutor.com`.
Any code paths that generate public URLs via `getPublicUrl(...)` / `getPublicAssetUrl(...)` produce `https://growithtutor.com/...` URLs.
No changes are made to read-only paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.

file_operations.description: Adjust getPublicDomain() resolution order so production builds default to the fixed domain growithtutor.com (not window.location.hostname or other environment-provided host), while still allowing an explicit override only when intentionally set; keep getPublicUrl/getPublicAssetUrl consistent with https://growithtutor.com/ URL generation.

requirements.summary: Ensure the standalone landing page constant and helper generate asset URLs using https://growithtutor.com consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: Standalone landing page asset URLs constructed by the helper function resolve to `https://growithtutor.com/...`.

file_operations.description: Keep STANDALONE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN set to growithtutor.com and update the standalone helper/related link construction so any URLs derived from the standalone domain configuration consistently resolve to https://growithtutor.com/... (including ensuring no remaining hardcoded mismatching domain values are used for URL construction).
